name: markdown-fm
description: A WordPress plugin for managing YAML frontmatter schemas in theme templates and partials. Inspired by [PagesCMS](https://pagescms.org/docs/), Markdown FM allows you to define structured content schemas with an intuitive interface and ACF-like template functions.
author: Silvestar BistroviÄ‡ <me@silvestar.codes> (https://www.silvestar.codes/)
